name: Frank's Foods!
description:
A semi-idle management game addressing the wicked problem of capitalizing on others during the pandemic.

Play as an overworked and under-paid employee at owner Frank's catering business turned PPE manufacturer as you struggle to make ends meet whilst managing the entire business.

Craft PPEs to sell and dodge the local inspector looking to shut down your business as you try your best to make your owner's dreams come true!
